name: The Crucifixion
description: The Crucifixion; Master of the Kremnitz Stadtbuch (Austrian, active beginning early 1420s); Vienna, Austria; about 1420 - 1430; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 41.9 x 31 cm (16 1/2 x 12 3/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig V 6, fol. 147v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Crucifixion
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
